About
In 2002, Geek Squad became part of Best Buy, and together we've provided trusted, expert service for millions of customers. You'll find Geek Squad in every Best Buy store, with more than 20,000 Agents across the country ready to help.
Services
Protect & Support Plus gives you peace of mind with your computer or tablet.
24/7 Support for setup, viruses and more
Coverage for accidental drops and spills
Replacement of failed, original battery
Schedule Service
Contact Us
